text: haey( chaur changcha) nowpel del yeung ban dak kechchasanyea leu puok anak haey yeung ban leuk phnom tuo r laeng pi leu puok anak( a l laoh ban banhchea tha) chaur puok anak ttuol yk aoy brakadabracha nouv avei del yeung ban phdal aoy puok anak( kompir ta v rt) haey puok anak trauv changcham nouv avei del mean nowknong kompir nih daembi aoy puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh
